Title: Smoker's Guide to AA Hard Support

ItemTooltips.branches: Buy 3 if a team member buys wards for you
ItemTooltips.gem: Buy and Give to team member if needed
ItemTooltips.magic_stick: Very Cost effective item for survivability. NOTE: this item will save you
ItemTooltips.dust: Uses: DO NOT LET Riki, BH, Brood, SNOWBALL!!
ItemTooltips.courier: Hard Supports buy courier or go home!!
ItemTooltips.power_treads: My boots of choice for AA, unlike other supports this hero benefits quite a bit from auto attacks when using chilling touch properly. The attack speed/suriviability these provide work wonders on AA. NOTE: Tread swtiching can save your life or help take another -_0
ItemTooltips.mekansm: the Bread and Butter Hard Support Item get ASAP
ItemTooltips.urn_of_shadows: Great early game pick up. Gives much needed Mana regen when you dont buy Arcane boots. This item can mean the difference between your life or death, also can give your ice blast just that little push it needs to make your enemies SHATTER!!
ItemTooltips.sheepstick: Only when you have a HUGE amount of extra Gold
ItemTooltips.cyclone: All around good utility Item that Gives Cold Feet 100%succes rate. Rotation: Cold Feet-scepter
ItemTooltips.force_staff: Definite Pick up should you have extra Gold.
ItemTooltips.ultimate_scepter: I very nice pick-up should you have extra gold after ward/smoke upkeep. Makes your Ice-Blast a force to be noted 17 seconds without health regen is no joke!
ItemTooltips.arcane_boots:
Great support item Prefered when your team is in need of mana regen.
Ex: no other arcane boots, or mana regen passive
ItemTooltips.tranquil_boots: All Boots are viable on AA. Though i wouldnt reccomend Tranquils with my guide since I advise heavy use of your ability chilling touch. Tranquils do however come into play if your team comp doesnt benefit too much from early levels of Chilling touch, which is almost never the case.

AbilityTooltips.ancient_apparition_cold_feet: Note: AA is a very Situational Support hero, but when used correctly can net your Carry a ton of farm/kills. Cold Feet is a skill that requires a lot of communication between u and your lane partners. With good timing and a Stun/slow makes for easy kills. Rotation: Cold Feet-Stun/Slow-right clicks
AbilityTooltips.ancient_apparition_ice_vortex: Vortex Is a follow up skill for the most Part. It can also be used to give slight vision on the field and Mini-map.Use after Ice Vortex to increase Cold Feet success chance. Also use during a chase or get away as it slows hero movement Significantly. Keep this up during any team fight
AbilityTooltips.ancient_apparition_chilling_touch: Chilling Touch Is AA's most situational skill. You as a support need to determine when this is Viable. It sacrifices attack speed for increased damage. Use early game to pack a PUNCH in your early game right clicks. NOTE: does NOT work towers
AbilityTooltips.ancient_apparition_ice_blast: Ice Blast when Used correctly Makes AA a Global support, but plays a huge roll in team fights. Uses: To initiate a team fight or long range Gank. Note: Ice Blast stops all forms of regeneration Ex: auto Regen, Mekansm, Healing skills. Note: Has a low cooldown so can be used before and after Fights
